benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: PUT /1.0/kb/admin/payments/{paymentId}/transactions/{paymentTransactionId} - Update existing paymentTransaction and associated payment state

covered: Valid Request: TC01 and TC02 cover successful updates with HTTP 204 and DB updates
Non-Existing Resource: TC06 and TC07 cover 404 Not Found for missing paymentId or paymentTransactionId
Partial Update: TC23 demonstrates updating with only required fields (allowed partial update)
Concurrency: TC17 tests concurrent updates on the same transaction and ensures final state consistency
Missing/Invalid Input: TC03 (missing header); TC04, TC05 (invalid IDs); TC08 (invalid state data); TC09 (missing body); TC10 (malformed JSON)
Edge/Headers/Query: TC02 (optional headers), TC13 (extra fields ignored), TC24 (header combos), TC25 (extra query params), TC26 (whitespace variations); TC27 (mismatched IDs)
Resilience/Performance: TC16 (timeout); TC21 (high load); TC22 (dependent service degraded); TC20 (regression)
gaps: Rate limiting / throttling tests are missing
Caching behavior (ETag/Cache-Control) is not tested for PUT
Explicit 403 Forbidden tests are missing (beyond 401 Unauthorized)
500 Internal Server Error scenarios are not covered
Explicit tests for disallowing partial updates (if policy prohibits) are missing
recommendations: Add rate limiting tests to verify throttling behavior under burst loads
Add tests for caching headers (ETag and Cache-Control) and their behavior on updates
Add 403 Forbidden tests to differentiate from 401 Unauthorized
Add 500 Internal Server Error tests to validate system resilience
Explicit tests for disallowing partial updates if applicable, or confirm that partial updates are allowed and add coverage accordingly
Strengthen concurrency tests to ensure correctness under higher contention and verify final state consistency
